pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lazy Search in R Packages, Task Views, CRAN, the Web. All-in-One Download // Search by keywords in R packages, task views, CRAN, the web and display the results in console, txt, html or pdf pages. Download the whole documentation (html index, pdf manual, vignettes, source code, etc) with a single instruction. Visualize the package dependencies. Several functions for task view maintenance and exploration of CRAN archive. Quick links to more than 70 web search engines. Lazy evaluation of non- standard content is available throughout the package and eases the use of many functions.
